channel.title: Are Private Servers "ok" To use and make?
channel.description:
Guys I have been tied up about this. I don't know what to do. i would love to make my own Private server, I know how to do it. I looked this up and I am getting mixed answers. Some say it is ok to do because a person in the beginning "winterlove" made rsps from scratch or something, so there is nothing wrong with it. I am also hearing that it is very illegal, but jagex doesn't care about it. Some even say Jagex will hunt you down. lol.
What are your thoughts?

item.dc:creator: @magicrcher_2 magicrcher 2
item.description:
@magicrcher_2 wrote:

sorry ill fix it im not good typer and i was in hurry
here it is fixed

ok so every sponsored server had donation and like 50 people donated how did that server or those servers stay up so long I don’t think jagex care if you make 100 bucks per server they make 1000 bucks per day million of people pay for membership and a lot of people pay for a year membership its illegal ok so that does mean you’ll get cut for sure -.- some people worse stuff and still don’t get cut like when they go to theater they take video of it with small cameras like really small and post them on illegal websites don’t worry if you’re server gets sponsored make a lot of cash then ya maybe but if not its ok servers don’t get much people if you’ll really lucky and not sponsored maybe 50 people and not all online at the same time anyways its ok to make a server and client a lot of people have done it and are they in trouble? Or they go to jail? Did they have to pay money because of that? No they didn’t so its ok and again if you’re unlucky don’t even try to make a server. (I know making client is illegal so don’t say its illegal cause I know) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 28, 2009, 05:04:49 pm[/size][hr]i know i know still bad but tell me if you dont understand ill put more tiem on it i only fixed spelling using the program word so ya

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

__--BBLLAARRGGHH--__:

So it is possible to make a full RSPS legally if you build the client and cache and shit yourself?

Technically no because you would still have to have never used any other client, nor taken ideas or concepts from their clients.

item.source: Are Private Servers "ok" To use and make?

item.title: Are Private Servers "ok" To use and make?
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

This was posted b4, and again the only reason JaGex has problems with Rsps in general is because the use of people using THEIR cache to gain profit and / or Rs acc’s.

This is why, when you host, only let mods/admins for people who earn it, and don’t accept donations(unless you find a way to prove you legally use it for the price of hosting your server), don’t give staff for Rs acc’s, don’t even think of Runescape when your hosting, don’t sell staff for cash, don’t sell rs acc’s for cash etc, those are the main things that make JaGex want to kill us

And it’s not like there isn’t someone from JaGex supervising these websites atleast once a week to find large servers and check them out to see if they break their main rules.

As stated,
server = ours
clients = theirs

I don’t think JaGex minds as much as they could about us using their cache (under 508) just i can only assume they will get frustrated seeing people with 550+ cache etc, seeming all their work is being leeched into someone elses hands.

So yeah, just don’t involve real life cash and runescape accounts, and your good :P.

Read full topic
item.source: Are Private Servers "ok" To use and make?

item.title: Are Private Servers "ok" To use and make?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:19, topic:299678”][quote author=r0ckstar96 link=topic=395972.msg2941722#msg2941722 date=1251928594]

Who cares? Unless you are selling items originally created(I believe) by Jagex for actual money on some HUGE private server, they aren’t going to bother suing you.

Hmm… Ok. I’ll take your word for it. (Am I really about to believe a said 11 year old?)
[/quote]

That didn’t make sense.[/quote]
I said that because on Chassy’s profile it says his age is 11[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2009, 05:07:17 pm[/size][hr]hmmm nvm, now it says 15

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:16, topic:299678”]Servers = ours
=> Servers legal. Clients Illegal.
Clients = Jagex’s

And i think it’s ok cause there are so many servers out there running fine, just don’t host the client in your vps or don’t make a webclient. I think the ones that got shut down was cause they were hosting their client on the vps or making webclients or something like that. (that’s what i read on r00n-serba a few months ago.) :|[/quote]

Battlescape uses a Webclient and they’ve been up for months.
